website_summaries.verdict: It's hard to find a better pair of Maui Jim sunglasses that offers more – clear vision, comfortable fit, and stylish appeal.
pros: Surpasses the others on our list for having a comprehensive feature list – lightweight fit, polarized lenses, anti-glare protection, anti-slip wear, and a reasonable price
Owners boast about their modern, attractive look
cons: Some fit and authenticity issues have been noted
The downside of the light, frameless design is that they are somewhat flimsy

customer_reviews.title: NOT COVERED BY WARANTY!!
customer_reviews.text: Maui Jim will not honor warranty for glasses bought on Amazon! My pair broke in half after 5 months. Shipped them back to MJ's repair site in Peoria Illinois, and was told MJ WILL NOT COVER repairs because I bought them here. Wanted $110 to fix their defective product. I won't buy this brand again. On top of all that, the polarized lenses I got scratched super easily.
customer_reviews.author: J. Peg

customer_reviews.title: great looking glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great!! absolutely no glare at all. this is my 3rd pair of Hookipa's, but first with the blue lens. Blue lens looks amazing, but the colors are not as vibrant as with the grey lens, there is a slight blue hue at the bottom of the lens in certain light, and also I noticed the blue lens scratches a little easier. Overall still great glasses that I would recommend to anybody. 4 star only because they scratch easily, and I only use the Maui Jim case to clean them.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price . . . so easy on your eyes. Really a soothing way to "see" the world - Florida's sun is bright and these sunglasses cool down the view while enhancing it. Best of all, they're light weight so they don't fall down your nose but stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Love my Maui Jims
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I've bought >First pair survived 4 years of heavy use, including an infant through toddler years grabbing, pushing and otherwise playing with them. I still have the first pair, but their lenses have gotten scratched up enough over the years they're not enjoyable to wear any more. If I have a complaint, I can't say I love the new foldable case - it's a cool idea but in execution, it's harder to use.. but.. if you're travelling really light, I could see it be nice so when not in use ,you can fold it flat and throw it in a pretty tight packed bag. As always, great quality, great fit and feel, and amazing lenses.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Just really good sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Edited: The zipper on the glasses case broke after only two months. Very disappointed in the quality of this product. Will not purchase again if this exemplifies their quality control issues. These are very light, don't fall apart easily, and are extremely comfortable to wear. I really like the rubberish nose clamps - they are soft and make the sunglasses feel weightless. They look good, don't scratch easily, and store neatly. I used to buy Oakley A Frames but traded to these when a friend showed them to me. It's been 3 years now and the only reason I have to replace them now is because I lost them in the surf at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Talvi

customer_reviews.title: Polarized and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I live on the water and I needed glasses that were polarized and lightweight. These fit the bill. I can bend over and they do not fall off! Crystal clear as well. I had a pair of glasses that I had for 6 years and they finally fell off of my cap.. I was devastated. I have never owned Maui's but if these hold up to my expectations...I will purchase another pair. They were on back order I believe and the shipping notification changed daily but I am a patient person. Only problem was that the box was somewhat dented yet the product was not damaged. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Guiler

customer_reviews.title: Not all that...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I think they look cool but are a pain for guys. The case is triangular which makes any pocket bulge way out and getting them in and out of the pocket is anything but easy. Having straight temples and so lightweight, don’t think of holding them by dropping One temple down your T-shirt and walk around. I’ve dropped them so many times like this, and scratched the lenses, it is ridiculous. As others said, getting one lens replaced is 1/2 the total cost of the sunglasses. Too “fancy” and fragile for me to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Syngen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I love this pair of sunglasses. I got introduced a few years ago when I bought my first Maui Jim sunglasses and it’s by far my favorite brand. The first pair I bought had black lenses and a blue frame. The one I just bought stands really out with a nice blue polarized lenses. It looks very classy, sharp, cool and you can see everything very clear. I keep getting compliments from everyone. Obviously, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Love these, except the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this particular brand, color and style of sunglasses for at least 10 years. They do get scratched after many instances of dropping them on the ground. So I have had to replace them every few years. I cringe at the price, but love them too much to deprive myself. The best thing is the color. I have eyes sensitive to light, and these work great in both low sunlight and bright sunlight. I live in CA and wear them year round. I can even see well in grey sky conditions. I sure hope Maui Jim keeps making them. I can't afford to buy 10 pairs at once to last my lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: reader in ca

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second pair of these glasses that I have ordered for my husband. He liked the first pair for fishing/hiking and for playing outdoor sports, and he kept saying he wanted a second pair to keep in his car for driving instead of moving them back and forth because inevitably he would leave them in his fishing vest or in the car whenever he wanted them for the other activity. So now he has a pair for driving and a pair for sports and he loves these glasses, he says they are great for fishing being polarized and give a nice clear view when he is driving.
customer_reviews.author: RunnerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Quality Lenses, Jury Still Out on Frame
customer_reviews.text: These are replacing a pair of Ray Ban RB3183 sunglasses that I had owned for over 10 years but lost. I think the lens quality is great on these Maui Jim sunglasses but when these arrived the temple was bent on one side. I had to leave them sitting on my dashboard in the hot sun for them to go back to their normal shape. I have also noticed that the nose cushion is not as comfortable as my Ray Bans were, which is odd because these are very light glasses. Overall, I'm happy with them and probably just need to get used to them more.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable sunglasses I have ever had. They stay in place while jogging and sweating, there is no pinching at the nose, no pressure behind the ears, and are so lightweight that you forget you are wearing them. The color transmission is great as there are no color distortions which you get with low end glasses. In fact the colors are so accurate and crisp that I find myself wearing these until dusk. These are the best glasses I have ever had and will certainly look into another Maui Jim when the time comes that I am looking for another style.
customer_reviews.author: LI Shooter

customer_reviews.title: The lens quality is great and they really do the job in bright light
customer_reviews.text: I freely admit this is my first pair of relatively expensive sunglasses, The lens quality is great and they really do the job in bright light, Howeve, in my estimation the sidepieces and hardware seem a bit flimsy to me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE LOVE These Shades!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the MJ Barrier Reef shades & they're awesome but the Ho'Okipa have quickly become my favorite pair!! The thing I love about them is the fit, slips on comfortably covering my eyes perfectly! Lastly the main difference between the two shades is w/the Reefs if its not a sunshiny day they seem to give me a headache but w/the Ho'okipa doesn't matter if its a sunny, cloudy or a combo of the two, they don't bother me. Absolutely love 'em well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Paras Jagarnauth

customer_reviews.title: Glasses good, didn't like brownish tint
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these types of Maui Jims for many years...always lose them, never break them. Since my local sunglass store stopped carrying them, I had to order them hear. Same good glasses as before, but this pair things seem more "brownish" when looking thru them, instead of "bluish" like my other pairs. I'm still happy with them, just a minor annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Mushmouth

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this same style for years. I've had three pairs in a span of about 15 years. And I still have all three. That speaks volumes for their quality. The only reason I needed to replace is because of the eventual buildup of small scratches on the lens over the years, my own fault of course.
customer_reviews.author: Odie

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses you'll ever own!
customer_reviews.text: Another great Maui Jim product! Frame is super light weight. We bought these in another lens color too, but we love this new Blue Hawaii look. Best sunglasses you'll ever own!
customer_reviews.author: _R-

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic Maui Jim Lenses and or authentic Maui Jim frames
customer_reviews.text: Yikes! RIP OFF!! I purchased these "Maui Jim" sunglasses from this seller back in January. They looked real, I actually liked them. But when they broke just 2 weeks ago I sent them to Maui Jim to get repaired. Per Maui Jim these are not authentic Maui Jim glasses nor the frames. I paid good money for these RIP OFFS!!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Great shades, but this case is weird
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this style Maui Jim for years - this at least my third. Great shades, lightweight with nose pieces to keep the frame off my face. But all of the cases in the past were kinda rounded rectangles. The case with this new pair is shipped as a flat piece that expands into a triangular length, like a Toblerone chocolate bar. This shape does not easily fit into pockets, etc and with it's soft ends, seems to provide less protection for your expensive sunglasses. I'm probably going to use one of my old rounded cases instead.
customer_reviews.author: Thunder Stik

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these in the past 15 years. Great fit and perfect optics. I use them for all occasions: Softball Golf Boating and fishing Driving - morning, day and evening Indoors to cut down glare from lights Best pair of shades I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Fab
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing not to like! Glasses stay snuggly yet comfortably in place, doing their job protecting your eyes. I wore Rayban Aviators for years, but as I've aged, those glasses allow too much light in from all sides, hampering my vision. Maui Jims block the peripheral light very well, and I really like the way the world looks through the lens. Daylight has never looked better. Lastly, they look great too!
customer_reviews.author: Henry Revisborne

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Style of this pair of sunglasses has lasted for years I started buying this particular pair of five years ago and haven’t stopped since every time I lose them I have to pay $187 but I’m glad to do it because the darkness is just right not too dark not too late it makes everything look 10 times better!
customer_reviews.author: bergie24b

customer_reviews.title: A little different
customer_reviews.text: This is about my 5th pair of Ho'okipa sunglasses. I absolutely love them. Took a chance on the blue lens and they look great. But keep in mind the blue lens filters out the blue light, kind of giving everything an amber cast. Took me a bit of time to figure out if I could live with that, as I much prefer neutral gray lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Old Buzzard

customer_reviews.title: Loves his Maui Jim's
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these sunglasses! My brother and sister-in-law gave him the exact pair for Christmas and they were in his carry-on that was stolen out of his rental car on a trip to Calif in June!! Needless to say replacing his Maui Jim's wasn't our #1 priority from that but after all else was resolved and he was wearing his Maui Jim's again all was right in his world!! Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Puppy's gramma

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Unisex and Sporty Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son. Very good quality. These are polarized. Maui Jim sunglasses are highly recommended by our optometrist, especially polarized styles. Very high quality coatings.
customer_reviews.author: Credus

customer_reviews.title: No warranty support
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a pair about every two years, before they'd break or I'd lose them. This last pair broke after about 3 months by the simple act of folding them up to put in the case. Support was no help. Saying this was accidental damage or normal wear and tear. The company appears to be standing way behind their product, like they aren't even there. I'll go back to SAWFLYs or another company that actually has customer support. Might pay the $40+ handling and shipping to repair
customer_reviews.author: S. Dubbs

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, super soft, comfortable nose pads, high end lenses. I use these for everything, including cycling and mountain biking. Perfect lens tint, not too dark, which makes them great for the trails. Most of the time I barely know their on my face, which is one of my complaints about oakleys (heavy and rigid). I have dropped them a few times on pavement, and have not noticed a scratch yet, which is impressive. Also, they have great eye coverage for minimalist glasses, no light seeping though the sides. I would also recommend these for larger faces as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses not pocketed for shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Have several pairs of Maui and they are great. Bought these as a gift for friend and frustrated they came w a dented box. Should have bought at a store instead of shipping
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Just wow!
customer_reviews.text: When the sun is out, it prevents glare, when it’s cloudy and dingy out, it provides vision brightness and clarity. Awesome glasses, and oh, by the way, super light weight yet sturdy frames on your head.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff N.

customer_reviews.title: Don't know why I waited this long
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear, very little glare. Had not heard of these glasses until my Daughter told me how good they are. She was right on point. I'm ready to throw away my Ray-bans and Oakleys. Maui Jim - you are the best!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great fit great visibility, Love MJ's!
customer_reviews.text: Maui Jim quality. I love the contrast the Lens protrudes when I have these on in the sun. Used these mostly when I visited Hawaii in mid-April and had no problems with them. These are my 2nd pair of Maui Jims I own and once I figure to need/want another pair, they will most likely be Maui Jims again!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Nice clear lenses and comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are nice. Exactly what I expected for quality. However seller has them listed as bronze lenses/gloss black frame and I received bronze lenses/brown frame so these are not exactly what I wanted and I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for out on the water
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use out on the boat. Great at reducing the glare. Super light weight. Feels like I’m not even wearing sunglasses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses - disappointing packaging condition
customer_reviews.text: I love Maui Jim Sunglasses...have never been disappointed with their product. Very comfortable to wear and great sun protection for your eyes! What was a bit disturbing was the condition of the Maui Jim box when I received them. It had obviously been crushed and had been previously opened even though the bubble envelope was sealed. Is Amazon sending out items that have been previously returned? I will definitely buy from Maui Jim again, but not thru Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Maui Jim's!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Maui Jim sunglasses fan for years. Purchased this as a replacement for a pair that I had for at least 10 years. I accidentally snapped my original pair in half on one of those awkward drops. I wear these year round and my optometrist has said that it is obvious that I take care of my eyes and protect them from the harmful rays of the sun. Love Maui Jim's. Although they said it would take some time to receive these glasses, I received them within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Fireside 4

customer_reviews.title: Clear.  Comfortable. They’ll do.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and seemed kind of cheaply made at first. But the optics are very clear. They do t fall off my face. They’ve grown on me and I like them very much now
customer_reviews.author: Joan P.

customer_reviews.title: THE CATS MEOW!
customer_reviews.text: love the look the feel when wearing them, the comfort they give my eyes while wearing them I wear sunglasses all the time, as a matter of fact I hardly ever go without them during the day even when its cloudy. they are great
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th pair. Nice glasses. Just wish they had a tracking device so I wouldn't keep losing them. This is getting expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Terry C

customer_reviews.title: BEST SUNGLASSES ON THE MARKET
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive eyes during the daylight. After trying MANY different type of sunglasses, the “MAUI JIM” were the only pair that helped me deal with the daylight. They are on the expensive side but worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Severt

customer_reviews.title: My second pair...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shades. However, very easy to scratch. Starts 'loosening up' around 1.5 years so that you start thinking its getting close to time to replace or send to Maui Jim's for maintenance. It costs me $85 to get a replacement once before and they had pretty good customer service. I haven't needed it for awhile but I have heard that their customer service has declined. I'll see (hopefully no sooner than a few years) if that is true. For now, pleased enough with these to get another pair (after my last pair was stolen at the airport)
customer_reviews.author: Irby Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: The lenses are the clearest I've ever seen. Most sunglasses just make everything darker (which is great!). However, I feel like I actually see better with these on. They really make you appreciate the difference between cheap sunglasses and expensive ones. The quality is definitely there. Don't get me wrong, I still have several cheap pairs of sunglasses laying around for watersports or other instances where my glasses might get damaged or lost. But these are my go to pair for all my daily activities.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, look great
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace a favorite pair I thought I’d lost. Of course as soon as they arrived I found the missing pair in a shoebox with some other treasures my youngest has a accumulated. Now I have two pairs of these awesome shades. Great on the beach and out on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck C.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shades
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been to TONS of glasses stores all over the place. He has tried on tons of different glasses and couldn't find ones that fit quite like his old Oakleys. These glasses fit perfect, their lenses are of great durable quality, and they are very flexible. They are polarized which is a plus. I was very happy to find these glasses on here because the price was so much lower than at the retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Mel H.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved them until they literally snapped in half when I took them off yesterday. There are no scratches, ive kept them in the case, etc. Snapped right down the middle. I'm so upset that I spent so much on a pair of sunglasses with such poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim Customer Serivce - 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Love my Maui Jim’s. This is my 5th pair. I lost the original pair and didn’t hesitate to replace with another Maui Jim.
customer_reviews.author: Christina C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive eyed
customer_reviews.text: Have owned numerous pairs of maui Jim I have sensitive eyes and these are great they are dark and comfy love them
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Owned these before and loved them. Left them on an airplane. Other sunglasses just didn’t cut it so I finally just got them again. True polarized. Light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: These are fake
customer_reviews.text: Tried to get the lens replaced as I scratched them. Maui Jim said these were NOT authentic and were a counterfeit reproduction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really amazing lenses and frame!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received glasses just as they were sunglasses hut and they were perfect no scratches well packed so I am satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Aleks

customer_reviews.title: clearly counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: The product i was sent is obviously counterfeit. I've been wearing Maui Jim for years and this is the first time that I've had the nose guards and the side non slip pieces turn green. I've also experienced a stinging sensation on my nose from the guards. I am very unhappy with these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Cook Often

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sunglasses. Maui Jims are well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sunglasses. Maui Jims are well worth the money! They quality of the lenses is superb, comes with a nice case, and Maui Jim seems to have a great customer service department that stands behind their product. They aren't the most durable sunglasses in the world, I dropped them and got a small chip on the lenses, but it is hardly noticeable and my own fault for dropping them.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Barteck

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sunglasses, well made and I love the lenses so clear and vibrant
customer_reviews.author: cynthia Boyd

customer_reviews.title: light weight and comfortable. The plastic lenses are distortion free and perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: They are not too dark, light weight and comfortable. The plastic lenses are distortion free and perfect for outdoor activities. The only flaw is that they will scratch since they are plastic. I just got my third pair since 2007. I play beach volleyball and softball so my previous two pairs have gotten quite a beating over the time I've had them but they are so comfortable to wear while playing that they are well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rodel

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of sunglasses I have owned
customer_reviews.text: I came across Maui Jim's at a Sunglasses hut when I was shopping to replace a pair of Ray-bans that got lost. The salesperson told me that Maui Jim's had the best lenses and so I decided to order a pair on Amazon. The fit was great and I can confidently say this is the best pair of sunglasses I have owned. I have a diamond shaped face and the glasses look great. They also filter the light well making colors crisp and clear without being doing dark. Very happy with my purchase and recommned Maui Jim's.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic maui jim from Dexclusive
customer_reviews.text: Not authentic maui jim (seller: Dexclusive). Owned a pair from Macy's and bought another one today to compare. This one is flimsy, makes cracking noise when I move. Couldn't test lense to the fullest as today if a cloudy day. As for the authentic one, it's the best bang for your buck sunglass. Beats $300 oakley any day and it's super durable. My first pair went through hell and back. Only one tiny scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Mirdha

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were great. They look awesome and they have a name that everyone knows and loves. They are exactly as described too. I got them for my wife and she loves them. She finds them to be super comfortable and blocks the sun out just perfect. And they are quality made. they are by no means a junk item. The only negative is they are expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Incredible lenses
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these glasses - completely worth the price. They are incredibly light, but very durable. I bought them specifically for driving at dawn and dusk when it's too dark for grey lenses, but I still want a pair of glasses. The lenses are amazing. The brown lenses seem to enhance everything you look at - the world really looks dull without them on.
customer_reviews.author: Reese Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My wife had lasix surgery and needed good shades , she loves these. They look great on her , a lot less than local stores price
customer_reviews.author: Larry J.

customer_reviews.title: very happy..
customer_reviews.text: Big Maui Jim fan got these already in grey black so had to get then in blue when I saw them, very light weight and fit my melon head , very happy ... if you like these also check out there red sands also light weight and big size ...
customer_reviews.author: phlpdon

customer_reviews.title: Maui Wowwie
customer_reviews.text: Love these light polarized sun glasses. Super light, super comfortable, and they look great too. It's like the 3rd pair I've purchase over 10 years. Take care of them and they'll last! Get you some! :D
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: 36 hours cross-country with no eye fatigue at all!
customer_reviews.text: Warranty is amazing - the MJ shop is my hero! Glasses are so good, I couldn't be without them while I had warranty work done so I bought a second pair. I play keep-away with my wife over these. They're life-changing; they're that good. Driving is absolutely pleasant with these - 36 hours across country with NO fatigue what-so-ever. Jason
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: My first pair scratched fairly easily; but
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair (unfortunately, I lost the first pair). My first pair scratched fairly easily; but, I still love the fit. And I feel that they are very versatile in different lighting conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Sunglass fit
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style of these sunglasses but if you have a wide/large face it will not fit. I need sunglasses with a 60+ width and although these were 60, they were still too narrow fo fit my face. Basically, I think it's the styling. It's still a good looking pair of sunglasses for people with narrower face features, it just wasn't right for me.
customer_reviews.author: BrianW

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim Sunglasses not Authentic
customer_reviews.text: I damaged my Maui Jim Sunglasses and I sent them to Maui Jim to be repaired, they sent them back to me with letter that they were unable to repair these sunglasses because they were not authentic Maui Jim sunglasses and that they were a counterfeit reproduction.
customer_reviews.author: JWilcox

customer_reviews.title: Always happy with Maui Jims!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of these beauties. I absolutely love how light they are and comfortable! Frames are bendable without breaking and just fit so light while wearing them. I love this piece and will continue to buy these exact versions every time! Awesome glasses!
customer_reviews.author: JOE MOLALE

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: Maui Jim's have been my go to sunglasses for years. They fit great. I look good in them. The polarized lens are awesome. Can't go wrong with a Maui.....
customer_reviews.author: james r young

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Wrong color they are black with a blue tint. Good glass but wish they were the proper color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best glasses on the planet!
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses. I own multiple pair of Maui Jim. Great company to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Liverman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: One of the few brands that fits well and comfortable on the bride of my nose without leaving a mark after wearing I for a long period. Have been using the same model for years. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for his birthday. He will only wear Maui Jim and finds these glasses perfect in size for the beach. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cobber

customer_reviews.title: awesome lenses and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Light, awesome lenses and great quality. Mine didn’t had a microfiber cleaning cloth for an expensive sunglasses and you will find in Ray-Ban or Serengeti sunglasses...
customer_reviews.author: José A. Orta-Cotto, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: The best sunglasses on the planet
customer_reviews.text: The best sunglasses on the planet, Period. I have four pairs of them now and the lenses are top quality and the best ever. Worth the money, but they aren't cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Leftwich

customer_reviews.title: Maui Wowi Man!
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of rose Serengeti sunglasses that were OK, these MJ's are quality shades, love the rose tent and they fit my Big Head Todd billiard ball of a head. All I need is some Tasty Waves and some cool....... and I'll be fine...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: A good everyday pair of sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased like 12 of these over the past several years. They are good for everyday use. I would have given 5 stars if they didn't seem to scratch so easily when they drop. But they fit well, are not to sporty or too fashionable. A great pair of toned down sunglasses. Kind of like a Submariner Rolex. Classy but not to fancy so that you can wear them for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Glasses just arrived. $206 total order cost and every ...
customer_reviews.text: Glasses just arrived. $206 total order cost and every screw in the frames is loose. The lenses move around and the glasses Make a clicking noise every time I move them because of the loose screws. l will be returning these.they are obviously knockoffs or someone is putting these together out of overstocked parts. DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: Humble opinion

customer_reviews.title: Best glasses to run in, flip on your head, and protect from the sun!
customer_reviews.text: These are my running glasses and have had them for 5+ years - I gravitate to them all the time - not just running!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are great sunglasses. They are light weight and good looking and will keep the glare out of your eyes in any circumstances! We recently drove through a blinding blizzard in Montana and these sunglasses made it possible to make out details we would not have otherwise been able to see in the blazing white-out. So glad I had them along!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie J. Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shades
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses especially with a strong sun in the tropics where i reside. Cool to the eyes allowing great visual ability.
customer_reviews.author: john ascenzia

customer_reviews.title: yet sturdy. I wear them almost everyday and broke my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many sunglasses over the years. These are light weight, yet sturdy. I wear them almost everyday and broke my first pair by dropping them and stepping on them on a very rough hike. Had those 3+ years. I now have 2 pair, one is always in the car. The other is for every day wearing, hiking, yard work, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Horrible..
customer_reviews.text: Horrible...not Maui Jim sunglasses. What I received was some cheap “Ronsou” $19 sunglasses placed in a Maui Jim glasses case. Returned them immediately. Don’t waste your money...
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: One pair every six years!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these exact sunglasses since 2004. Six years from each pair isn't bad. Good optical qualities as far I can discern, light weight, very flexible and comfortable. I hope they keep making them.
customer_reviews.author: John T Haley

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Owned a lot of these over the yrs. Best glasses I’ve ever had very rugged and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Witham Jr

customer_reviews.title: which makes them more comfortable for wearing for longer periods of time
customer_reviews.text: They feel lighter than other glasses, which makes them more comfortable for wearing for longer periods of time. The arms seem a bit long though...especially when wearing a hat with them (maybe it's just me though). But they are very clear and very durable. And Maui Jim has great customer service...I broke a previous pair once and they sent new ones out immediately without question or charging me.
customer_reviews.author: Rob D

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Root beer colored frames were in the box , not black or mirror finish on Lens ?
customer_reviews.author: GREG WEBB

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these glasses, the fit and the vision quality are perfect. Unfortunately ive purchased three pairs and ive lost three pairs. Shame on you Maui Jim for making unloyal sunglasses that dont return to there loving masters. :(
customer_reviews.author: Nj1

customer_reviews.title: Great Polarized Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: My first pair got stolen, so I took these to my local optometry services to get them adjusted. I will have to go back the 3rd time, they still pinch my nose. Other than that I just love them and they protect my eyes very well. I need superb protection in sunny Texas with macular enema in one eye.
customer_reviews.author: Chatita

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim are the best sunglasses that money can buy.
customer_reviews.text: I am in my late 50's and have sensitive eyes and have always lived in a sunny climate so have worn sunglasses my whole adult life. Tried them all and found that no matter what style you choose, Maui Jim's are superior in lens quality, fit and manufacture than any brand available today. Don't buy cheap sunglasses - go with Jims.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W. Corley

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Only pair of sunglasses my husband wears. They are super light
customer_reviews.author: Iz

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses on the market
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses. This is my third pair of the same style of Maui Jim's. They are light on my face, screen the sun well due to their great polarized lenses, and a great sporty style. I prefer the rose lense to keep colors natural when wearing my glasses. Maui Jim's are the best of all the sunglasses on the market.
customer_reviews.author: MHW

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I have never been much of the sunglasses ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have never been much of the sunglasses type but, I had a similar pair before and loved them and had to get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: alex romanos

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my husband and he was instantly impressed. He loved how light weight and flexible they were. He didn't feel like he was going to instantly break them. He was very excited and has been very pleased, and I think they look great on him.
customer_reviews.author: breesygirl

customer_reviews.title: These were to replace a previous pair of MJ that ...
customer_reviews.text: These were to replace a previous pair of MJ that I lost on the beach. No complaints with either one
customer_reviews.author: Chad Carlson

customer_reviews.title: It is incomplete
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses did not come with case nor its soft pouch... I was really surprised that it only came with the sunglasses. Paid 200 dollars for a product that in my opinion it needs the complete accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben E. Huaman

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and good looking
customer_reviews.text: Light weight comfortable blue lens looks great. Used for every day use and paddle boarding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t purchase these again.
customer_reviews.text: Snug fit, but smudge easy. For the money Costas are better value
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Feels like cheap $10 glasses
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. Didn’t arrive with a straight frame. I don’t even wear them anymore, these were either fakes or a waste of $
customer_reviews.author: Brad W

customer_reviews.title: Not for a large head
customer_reviews.text: Great protection from sun and glare as well good polorazation
customer_reviews.author: Charles Vandemark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved Maui Jim sunglasses, but these are awesome!! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Leather Roses by Dee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Light
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of sunglasses! These are really light and comfortable for casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Prof D

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I loved these glasses for two months, that's all they lasted. They were very comfortable and light weight however lint and dust seems to stick to them very easily. I tried lens wipes and specialty sunglass cleaner but they were impossible to keep clean. I've previously worn Oakleys for years and have never had this problem so I know it wasn't something I was doing wrong. Alas, one sunny day, I accidentally dropped them 2 feet and the pavement dented the lens so bad that they are not wearable. Expensive sunglassss should be able to withstand gentle drops without too much physical damage.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl G.

product_meta.title: Maui Jim Ho'okipa Rectangular Sunglasses
product_meta.description: The Hawaiian word ho'okipa means hospitality, which is the inspiration behind these frames. The Ho'okipa polarized rimless sunglasses from Maui Jim welcome you with a wide variety of durable polycarbonate lens color options and trusted, long-lasting durability.
feature_bullets: Click the Maui Jim link above to visit our brand store, where you can find our entire catalog of sunglasses
All Maui Jim sunglasses feature PolarizedPlus2 lens technology that go beyond shielding your eyes from glare and harmful UV rays by enhancing colors to reveal the true beauty of the world around you
Enjoy ultimate UV protection combined with premium style, incredible durability, glare-free vision, and color-boosting patented technologies
HCL Bronze lenses feature a warm tint that provides versatility in changing light conditions
Lenses made with MauiPure material for crisp optics and excellent shatter & scratch resistance
Frames constructed from lightweight, injected nylon, designed for extreme comfort and extended wear time
